DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters
Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Billable and Non-Billable Actual Hours in % of User Capacity",
        "WidgetType": "grid",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "",
        "WidgetHeight": "",
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "WidgetMetrics": {
                "visible": false,
                "Metrics": [
                    {
                        "visible": false,
                        "metricName": "# Forecast",
                        "metricFieldValue": "TimeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": false,
                        "metricName": "# Actual",
                        "metricFieldValue": "UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "SELECT
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.UserType,
		v.FullName,
		v.UserId,
		v.HasImage as HasImage,
		v.[Hours],
		v.AdministrativeHours,
		v.InternalWorkHours,
		v.NewBusinessHours,
		v.BillableHours,
		v.ClientHours,
		v.NonWorkedHours,
		v.Capacity,
		v.Leaves,
		v.ContractedTime,
		v.ForecastTime,
        (v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, (v.ContractedTime / v.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
        IIF(v.ContractedTime > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.BillableHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationPercentage,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationNonBillablePercentage
from 
(
	select 
			v.UserTypologyGroup,
			du.UserType,
			du.FullName,
			v.UserId,
			du.HasImage as HasImage,
			sum(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
			sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeHours,
			sum(v.InternalWorkHours) as InternalWorkHours,
			sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
			sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.ClientHours) as ClientHours,
			sum(v.NonWorkedHours) as NonWorkedHours,
			sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
			sum(v.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
			sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
			sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime
	from (
		select 
				du.UserTypologyGroup, 
				du.Oid as UserId,
				sum(du.ActualTime) as [Hours],
				sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
				0 as InternalWorkHours,
				sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessHours,
				sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableHours,
				0 as ClientHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(du.ActualTime - (du.AdministrativeTime + du.NewBusinessTime + du.BillableTime), 0.0)) as NonWorkedHours,
				sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
				sum(du.LeaveTime) as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from Analytics.DatamartUser du
		where 
				(du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) and
				du.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
				(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid) AND
				(du.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
					du.Department, 
					du.UserTypologyGroup, 
					du.FullName,
					du.HasImage,
					du.Oid
		union
		select 
				dt.UserTypologyGroup, 
				dt.UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0.0)) AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.BillableTime, 0.0) - ISNULL(dt.[InternalWorkTime], 0.0)) as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from Analytics.DatamartTimesheet dt
		where 
				dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
				(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid) AND
				(dt.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				dt.Department, 
				dt.UserTypologyGroup, 
				dt.[User],
				dt.UserId
		union
		select 
				de.UserTypologyGroup, 
				de.UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from Analytics.DatamartEstimate de
		where 
				de.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
				(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid) AND
				(de.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				de.UserTypologyGroup, 
				de.[User],
				de.UserId
		union
		select 
				ph.UserTypologyGroup,
				ph.UserId as UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.DatamartPlannedHours ph,
				Analytics.DatamartProject dp
		where 
				ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
				dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND
				(ph.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				ph.UserTypologyGroup,
				ph.[User],
				ph.UserId
	) v left outer join (select distinct du.FullName, du.HasImage, du.UserType, du.UserTypeId, du.Oid from Analytics.DatamartUser du)du on du.Oid = v.UserId
where (du.UserTypeId = @UserType or @UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by 
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserType,
		du.FullName,
		du.HasImage,
		v.UserId
) v"
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {
            "RequiredFilters": [
                "startDate",
                "endDate",
                "companyOid",
                "divisionOid",
                "departmentOid",
                "TypologyGroupOid",
                "UserType"
            ]
        }
    }
]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Groups
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Staff, Proposals & Timesheet",
        "WidgetType": "grid",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "",
        "WidgetHeight": 200,
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "WidgetMetrics": {
                "visible": false,
                "Metrics": [
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "? Delayed To Do",
                        "metricFieldValue": "DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "?  Delayed Work in Progress",
                        "metricFieldValue": "DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "select 
		t.Division,
		t.Department,
		t.TypologyGroup,
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		t.UserCount,
		t.Capacity,
		t.Holidays,
		t.Leaves,
		t.ContractedTime,
		t.PlannedTime,
		t.ForecastTime,
		t.ActualTime,
		t.BillableTime,
		t.NewBusinessTime,
		t.AdministrativeTime,
		t.ClientTime,
		t.ClientBillableTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) as BillableAndPlannedTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ClientTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityClientTimeVariation,
        IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ContractedTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndPlannedVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndPlannedVariation,
        IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation
		
from(
select 
		t.Division,
		t.Department,
		t.TypologyGroup,
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		sum(t.UserCount) as UserCount,
		sum(t.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(t.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(t.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(t.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(t.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(t.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(t.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(t.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(t.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(t.ClientTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(t.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from(
select 
		du.Division,
		du.Department,
		v.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupOid,
		count(distinct v.UserId) as UserCount,
		sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(v.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(v.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(v.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(v.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime + v.NewBusinessTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(v.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
(
select 
		du.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserTypologyGroupId,
		du.Oid as UserId,
		sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(du.HolidayTime) as Holidays,
		sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		sum(du.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartUser du
where 
        (du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) AND
		du.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
		(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
		(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid)
group by 
		du.UserTypologyGroup,
		du.UserTypologyGroupId,
		du.Oid
union
select 
		de.UserTypologyGroup,
		de.UserTypologyGroupId,
		de.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartEstimate de,
		EstimateItemDetail edt
where 
		de.ItemId = edt.Oid and edt.[Type] = 2 and
		de.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
		(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
		(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR de.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid)
group by 
		de.UserTypologyGroup,
		de.UserTypologyGroupId,
		de.UserId
union
select 
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		sum(pht.[Hours])as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartPlannedHoursTotal pht,
		Analytics.DatamartProject dp
where 
		pht.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
		dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR pht.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
		(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR pht.DivisionId = @DivisionOid)
group by 
		pht.UserTypologyGroup,
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		pht.UserId
union
select 
		ph.UserTypologyGroup,
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId,
		ph.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartPlannedHours ph,
		Analytics.DatamartProject dp
where 
		ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
		dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
		(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.DivisionId = @DivisionOid)
group by 
		ph.UserTypologyGroup,
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId,
		ph.UserId
union
select 
		dt.UserTypologyGroup,
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId,
		dt.UserId as UserId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		sum(dt.ActualTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartTimesheet dt
where 
		dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		dt.Client is not null and
		(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
		(@DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.DivisionId = @DivisionOid) AND 
		(@DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.DepartmentId = @DepartmentOid)
group by 
		dt.UserTypologyGroup,
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId,
		dt.UserId
) v left outer join (select distinct du.Division, du.Department, du.UserType, du.UserTypeId, du.Oid from Analytics.DatamartUser du)du on du.Oid = v.UserId
where (du.UserTypeId = @UserType or @UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by
		du.Division,
		du.Department,
		v.UserId,
		v.UserTypologyGroup,
		v.UserTypologyGroupId 
) t
where t.TypologyGroupOid is not null
group by 
		t.Division,
		t.Department,
		t.TypologyGroup,
		t.TypologyGroupOid
) t
order by 
		t.TypologyGroup",
                "mapping": ""
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {
            "RequiredFilters": [
                "startDate",
                "endDate",
                "companyOid",
                "divisionOid",
                "departmentOid",
                "UserType"
            ]
        }
    }
]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Capacity (blue), Contracted Time (red) & Weeks with not Enough Capacity",
        "WidgetType": "rangeselector",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "#e0e0e0",
        "WidgetHeight": 100,
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "startDate": "2018/06/1",
                "endDate": "2019/06/30",
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "select  [Date] - datepart(dw, [Date]) + 1 as Week,
        sum(WorkingTime - Holidays - Leaves) as Capacity,
        sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
        iif(sum(WorkingTime - Holidays - Leaves - ContractedTime) < 0, sum(WorkingTime - Holidays - Leaves), null) as NotEnoughCapacity
from    (
                select  typ.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroupOid,
                        ssu.Oid as UserOid,
                        yrd.Day as [Date],
                        sum(RequiredHours) as WorkingTime,
                        0 as Holidays,
                        0 as Leaves,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        0 as ActualTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NewBusinessTime,
                        0 as AdministrativeTime
                from    [User] ssu, Yearday yrd, UserTypology typ
                where   datepart(dw, yrd.day) not in (1, 7) and
                        typ.oid = ssu.Typology
                        and Year(yrd.day) = @year
                group by typ.UserTypologyGroup, ssu.Oid, yrd.Day
                union all
                select  typ.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroupOid,
                        ssu.Oid as UserOid,
                        hld.Date as [Date],
                        0 as WorkingTime,
                        sum(RequiredHours) as Holidays,
                        0 as Leaves,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        0 as ActualTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NewBusinessTime,
                        0 as AdministrativeTime
                from    [User] ssu, UserTypology typ, Holiday hld
                where   datepart(dw, hld.Date) not in (1, 7) and
                        typ.oid = ssu.Typology and
                        ssu.Company = hld.Company 
                        and Year(hld.Date) = @year
                group by typ.UserTypologyGroup, ssu.Oid, hld.Date
                union all
                select  typ.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroupOid,
                        ssu.Oid as UserOid,
                        uv.Day as [Date],
                        0 as WorkingTime,
                        0 as Holidays,
                        sum(RequiredHours) as Leaves,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        0 as ActualTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NewBusinessTime,
                        0 as AdministrativeTime
                from    [User] ssu, UserVacation uv, UserTypology typ
                where   datepart(dw, uv.Day) not in (1, 7) and
                        uv.[User] = ssu.Oid and
                        typ.oid = ssu.Typology
                        and Year(uv.Day) = @year
                group by typ.UserTypologyGroup, ssu.Oid, uv.Day
                union all
                select  TypologyGroupOid,
                        UserOid,
                        [Date],
                        0 as WorkingTime,
                        0 as Holidays,
                        0 as Leaves,
                        sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
                        0 as ActualTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NewBusinessTime,
                        0 as AdministrativeTime
                from    (
                            select  edt.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroupOid,
                                    edt.[User] as UserOid,
                                    yrd.Day as [Date],
                                    sum(edt.Hours / (datediff(dd, est.[Date], est.Expiration) + 1)) as ContractedTime
                            from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, EstimateItemDetail edt, YearDay yrd
                            where   eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                                    edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                                    yrd.Day between cast(est.[Date] as date) and cast(est.Expiration as date) and
                                    edt.Type = 2
                                    and Year([Date]) = @year
                            group by  est.Oid, edt.UserTypologyGroup, edt.[User], yrd.Day
                        ) t
                group by TypologyGroupOid, UserOid, [Date]
        ) t
where   Year([Date]) = @year
group by [Date] - datepart(dw, [Date]) + 1",
                "mapping": ""
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {
            "RequiredFilters": [
                "year"
            ]
        }
    }
]
